&dhcommand; tool for control &dhservice;(1) daemon
&dhcommand;
start stop
DESCRIPTION
&dhcommand; command allowed start and stop &dhservice;(1) as service
OPTIONS
Usually command is launched from SystemV init script or SystemD service unit.
start
Start &dhservice;(1) in daemon mode (without terminal). The environment variable "START_KURENMA" with value "NO" (FALSE,0) prevents running of service
stop
Gracefully stop &dhservice;(1).
FILES
/etc/default/&dhpackage;
The system-wide configuration file to enable or disable starting &dhservice; by using environment variable START_KURENMA. "NO" value prevents service starting.
ENVIRONMENT
START_KURENMA
This variable with value "NO" prevents &dhservice; starting as service by &dhcommand;.
